articles.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq dip as Alphabet slides - Reuters
articles.description: The tech-heavy Nasdaq and the S&P 500 dropped on Wednesday as Alphabet slumped after its cloud division missed revenue estimates, while other mega-cap stocks were also pressured by rising U.S. Treasury yields.
